attributes.action: Hazard Bonus Payment for NHS workers during The Covid 19 Pandemic
attributes.additional_details: Because it's the right thing to do given the unprecedented circumstances and immense workload The NHS workers are currently under
attributes.background: Bonus payments to NHS workers to acknowledge the above and beyond care for the current Covid-19 Pandemic

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions calling for the same action:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303306
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/300073

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
